title: i love how when worlds our veiw changes
body: instead of na vs eu its West vs East

replies.body:
it's EU vs the world

NA sucks ass deal with it
yet 3rd place c9 is 2-0 while 1st place fnc is 1-1
And C9 just beat FNC, with Balls getting a Pentakill, dang :O
if i didnt watch the penta myself i woulda called u a lair xD i was shocked when he did it but your going onto an imobile darius THE ONLY WAY HE CAN GET TO YOU IS U JUMPING ON HIM lol
You really ate those words didn't you, dickhead.

You have mass media to thank, and some really dumb people.

It never change really, most people are always finding their next target to openly shat on with no consequences.

Today it's green skin people, tomorrow would be people who use left hand to eat XXX. As sad as it may sound.
I totally pull for EU as well as NA. The Eastern teams are so cocky that it's great to serve them some humble pie.
